remarks: A group multiple is the same if evaluated in a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
subgmulgcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
subgmulg.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
subgmulg.t $e |- .xb = ( .g ` H ) $.
subgmulg $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. S ) -> ( N .x. X ) = ( N .xb X ) ) $.
